name: Piplup
flavorText:
Because it is very proud, it hates
accepting food from people. Its
thick down guards it from cold.

previous.name: Infernape
previous.flavorText:
It uses a special kind of martial
arts involving all its limbs.
Its fire never goes out.

next.name: Prinplup
next.flavorText:
It lives alone, away from others.
Apparently, every one of them
believes it is the most important.

pokemon.name: Empoleon
pokemon.flavorText:
The three horns that extend from
its beak attest to its power. The
leader has the biggest horns.
